Subject: FW: [EXTERNAL] U.S. v. Maxwell S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) 
Date: Fri, 15 Oct 2021 22:28:30 +0000 
Attachments: Defense_Reply_to_Dkt_350.pdf; 2021.10.15_Decision_re_Legal_Mail_.pdf 
(USANYS)" 
Attaching the defense's letter reply and Judge Nathan's endorsement to our letter declining to enter the requested order, 
but setting forth her "firm expectation" that a defendant in a pre-trial posture like GM will "in most circumstances receive 
legal mail within approximately 1 business day" and allowing the defense to renew the request "if another delay occurs." 
From: BOBBI C STERNHEIM 
Sent: Friday, October 15, 2021 5:55 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
Cc: Christian Everdell 
>; 
Laura Menninger 
Subject: (EXTERNAL) U.S. v. Maxwell S2 20 Cr. 330 (AJN) 
Good afternoon-
Attached is a courtesy copy of today's ECF 
Bobbi 
Please note my new office address and preferred email address: 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
New York, NY 10007 
; Jeff Pagliuca 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim that may be 
confidential and/or privileged. 
If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. 
If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender immediately by reply e-mail and then delete this 
message. Thank you. 
On Oct 14, 2021, at 7:46 PM, BOBBI C STERNHEIM <bcsternheim@mac.com> wrote:
